question: The table was decorated with a ________ of flowers.
There were a ________ of ships at the quay.
My father _______ in the Ministry.
The telephone has ________ again.
In the sentence 'The woman gave her son money,' the indirect object is _______.
The teacher praised the students. The direct object is _________.
'My father sent me a letter', the direct object is _______.
'Mother told the children a story', the indirect object is ________.
In the sentence 'The cat caught a mouse', the subject is _______.
My father _______ every weekend.
A _______ of musicians performed during the swearing-in ceremony of the president.
All the girls in the party quarrelled with ______.
The principal sent Jessica and ______ on an errand.
The baby cried ________ when it was hungry.
He ______ scrubbed the floor to remove the stains on the tiles.
Nelly and her brother are always very fond of ______.
Which sentence contains an adjective?
The family head has always advised every other member to always endeavour to care for _______.
The boy’s father always _____ them to school on a daily basis.
Does your father always _________ his new car?
My teacher _______ us ever since the term began.
He has no money to attend the cinema; ________ his mother will not allow him.
David, Maureen and _______ were invited to a birthday party.
She must have ______ to the church where all the family members worship.
I would like to buy ______ umbrella as it seems rainy season is approaching.
Mr. Jones _____ visit his children at all times.
Tony and Samuel love ______ so much that they are always seen together.
I would like you to know that I can tidy up my work _______.
A _______ of angels are praising thy Lord.
The man hid the puppy ______ the table to avoid suspicion.
The man pleaded ______ his wife to allow him take his children to school.
My mom always drives me to school _____ her car.
The girl seems to be _______ today than yesterday.
The boy's pair of trousers _______ torn.
An ______ of soldiers took over the city.
No one _______ John's real name now.
My pencil _______ stolen before I woke up.
Audu says that he _______ up at 6:00 every morning.
My mother _______ my sister yesterday.
Mr. Cooks took Margret, Alice and _____ round the factory.
Tunji divided the money between David and ______.
Tony is a good friend of ______.
The breakdown of our marriage was no fault of ______.
He is almost as big as _______.
If I ______ you, I would do the homework now.
The head teacher came to our classroom but she didn't talk to _____.
I am afraid I _____ not be able to come with you because I am not sure if it would be possible.
The man _____ to the police station to file a complaint this morning.
James and Sam ______ not able to make it to school for they woke quite late.
She enjoys lots of ice-cream _____ her sister doesn’t.
